categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Dermian was a male Human Major of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Galactic War
During the Battle of Ilum, Major Dermian was based in the Imperial base camp under Colonel Baramak on Ilum. When a shipment of crystals was lost, Major Dermian asked an Imperial ally to recover it.
Major Dermian first appeared in the MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011.
It is only accessible to Imperial players in the game on Ilum.
